title: "Recognition for emergency service response to Summerland"
excerpt: "That's according to the chief minister who yesterday formally recognised the role emergency services across the Island played in the response. In a speech, Alfred Cannan said as many as 28,000 calls were made to police from residents and those off-Island, concerned for the wellbeing of the 3,000 people inside the building on the night."
